name: OpenMathInstruct-2
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A large-scale synthetic dataset of question-solution pairs, generated by augmenting MATH and GSM8K using Llama3.1 models.
notes: The dataset was created to enhance the training of large language models in mathematical reasoning, with significant improvements in performance on benchmarks like MATH through augmentation using the Llama3.1 models.
